title: Skyroads Music
content: Ive seen so many classic music threads lately, What about the Skyroads soundtrack? Mp3 anyone? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-christmas.gif[/img]

title: Re: Skyroads Music
content: What format is the music in?  I've often wanted to extract it but haven't been able to figure it out yet (not that I've spent a whole lot of time trying, mind you.)<font color="#EEF2EE">[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]</font>

title: Re: Skyroads Music
content:
well, it is adlib tune, in some sort of format.
I guess it would be possible to record in DRO

title: Re: Skyroads Music
content:
...

How does one even record DRO in DOSBox? All I ever found was dumping to wav (or making a screenshot, or dumping to a video file). [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] ____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].

title: Re: Skyroads Music
content:
download the lates dosbox
And use Ctrl+alt+F7, to turn on OPL recording
A message should appear in the terminal box , about it wil record at first note starts.

use the key combinations again to stop the recording

title: Re: Skyroads Music
content:

title: wow guys
content: I wasnt expecting many replys! thanks battery darkman, but anyone up for getting the whole soundtrack in MP3? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: wow guys
content:
Depend on what sorta soundtrack you whant
if you whant it orginal or remixed or enchanged.
Anyways for the orginal tunes, i could ripp them in DRO first and share them in raw.

I think there will be a little overcomplex whay to share it in DRO at the end, beacuse its so easy to get unwanted chunks in the file. So by using ADplug for winamp, and tyde up the file in rawedit. i have choice to share it in raw
By the way, i guess it will be possible to convert to imf. if that dro2mid tool is working 100%

hmmmm... skyroad music in CK? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

May i ask you whay you whant the wole soundtrack in mp3? whant to use the music on your mp3 player? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

title: heh
content: Yep my mp3 player [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]  original is preferred [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: keep em coming
content:
Keep em coming [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

These work great with Winamp and AdPlug

Put 16 bit, Stereo and 200000 KHZ is the higest it can go, Use Emulator number 1

title: Re: keep em coming
content:
i will as soon as possible, i just had to change my motherboard, beacuse it started to get very dirty, burned and dusty.
So now i got a new motherboard, and new installed windows, since my last windows refused to boot up, and i had problems to locate my 400GB slave disk.

But everthings seems to work fine now. so there will be more music tracks when i'm ready.

Sorry for the out-of-topic by the way, but i just feel to report. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
